name: HIVexposedinfantreasonforunknownfinalstatus
title: HIV-exposed infant reason for unknown final status
description: The outcome for the infant does not have a final outcome, which may because of death, stopped treatment or lost to follow-up.

mapping.name: Digital Adaptation Kit for Antenatal Care

element.short: HIV-exposed infant reason for unknown final status
element.definition: The outcome for the infant does not have a final outcome, which may because of death, stopped treatment or lost to follow-up.
element.comment: A process or automated method should be in place to update "On ART" to False when HIV treatment outcomes change
